description: The Material aspect model defines a standardized and interoperable representation based on VDA material classification and also covering chemical, thermal, and physical properties as well as material states, formats, and uncertainty information, in a consistent and machine-readable manner.

Text.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

ClassificationStandardEnumeration.description: This enumeration assures that only allowed classification standards are used.

MaterialClassificationCharacteristic.description: This characteristic binds the MaterialClassificationEntity to the materialClassification property.

materialSubgroup.description: A refined subset of a Material Group that classifies materials according to detailed technical distinctions such as alloying type, polymer family, manufacturing process, or functional properties.

materialGroup.description: A more specific subdivision within a Material Category. It organizes materials into technical families that share similar composition, structure, and performance characteristics.

materialCategory.description: The highest-level classification that groups materials into broad, fundamental classes based on their overall nature and fundamental properties.

classificationStandard.description: Standard according to which the material is classified.

WasteCodeEnum.description: Enumeration of waste codes according to EWC (european waste directory).

UuidV4Trait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

thermalCharacterization.description: Characterisation of Materials Thermal: Information about the material's behaviour under various thermal conditions.

chemicalCharacterization.description: Characterisation of Materials Chemical: Description of the chemical composition and properties of the material.

physicalState.description: The physical state of the material.

materialFormat.description: Format of material in the process step.

materialStatus.description: Status of the material in the process step

materialClassification.description: Classification of the material according to defined standards.

wasteCode.description: The waste code is used to identify the type of waste on part or material level.

globalAssetId.description: The fully anonymous ID in the dataspace of the part.
